casebody.data:
Nancy SNYDER
v.
Maxine DUNCAN, Jean Wilson, and Paul Buchanan. No. 382P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Stephen L. Snyder, for Nancy Snyder. Lloyd Hise, Jr., Spruce Pine, for Duncan & Wilson. Gerald McKinney, Greensboro, for Buchanan.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 22nd day of August 2008 by Defendant (Buchanan) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of December 2008."
